casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Melvin Lee WHITE, Jr. 505P96-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2017 Kristin D. Parks, Attorney at Law, Richard McNeil, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for White, Melvin Lee, Jr. L. Michael Dodd, Special Deputy Attorney General, Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari filed on the 11th of April 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 19th day of June 2017 to file and serve the Petition with this Court.
